Text.Page: I received a report of smoke rising from Aurum Road. Check with Fayza at the northwest gate and see if she can confirm.

Smoke? Who said smoke?

Baruch is a good captain, but between you and me, learning a few things about Val Aureum would do him some good. We don't exactly get forest fires.

Something was stirring up a dust cloud in that direction, though, now that you mention it. Would you go check with {@LinkCreature:224#1005#Veltana} at the West Watchpost?

Reinforcements! I'm so glad you're here. I've been asking for support forever.

Sand? We got. Dust? We got.

Look around. It's soldiers we don't got.
